text:
Agazio Loiero (born 14 January 1940) is an Italian politician. He was born in Santa Severina, Italy. He was a Senator between 1996 to 2001. He was also a Deputy between 1987 to 1994 and again from 2001 to 2005.
During the cabinet of Massimo D'Alema, he was Minister for Parliamentary Relations between 1999 to 2000. During the Giuliano Amato cabinet, he was Minister of Reginal Affairs between 2000 to 2001.
From 2005 to 2010, he was President of Calabria.
